## TextNode interface

Text node with chainable style methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface TextNode 
```

## Remarks

Text nodes provide a fluent API for applying terminal styling to text content. All styling methods return a new [TextNode](./dsl.textnode.md) instance, allowing for method chaining.

## Example


```typescript
text('Hello').bold().foreground('#ff79c6')
text('Warning').dim().italic()
```
